alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 19 at 3:41AM EDT until April 19 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches along with a light glaze of ice. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence, Western Essex, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties in northern New York. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are expected through early this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
